Articles.Content:
As of 5/8/2017, Steam Beta options does not have 1.3.0 available and it has completely destroyed the entire game - crashes to desktop immediately with mods installed.

1.2.2, 1.3.1, and 1.4.1+ are available, no longer has 1.3.0 available.

Screenshot Evidence

This will help you: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=889624474

Follow the steps, keep in mind that ksp 1.3 release date was May 25, 2017 and you should be able to download ksp 1.3 through steam. Not as comfortable as the beta program, but it is possible.

Edited May 8, 2018 by 4x4cheesecake

1 hour ago, 4x4cheesecake said:

This will help you: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=889624474

Follow the steps, keep in mind that ksp 1.3 release date was May 25, 2017 and you should be able to download ksp 1.3 through steam. Not as comfortable as the beta program, but it is possible.

Wow, you're more help than support

Actually worked. So far it's running in 1.3.1 beta but with 1.3.0 files, and actually chooses the load the game. Thanks for your help!
